name: Amaterasu
description: Summons inextinguishable black flames at the user's focal point.

name: Kamui Phase
description: Temporarily shifts the user's body partially into the Kamui dimension, making them intangible.

name: Bunshin no Jutsu (Clone Jutsu)
description: Creates a non-physical illusionary clone of the user. While the clone cannot attack, it can be used for distraction and misdirection.

name: Deception Technique
description: Creates false information to confuse enemies

name: Doton: Dust Sight
description: Manipulates dust particles to enhance the user's vision, allowing them to see through light obscuring conditions.

name: Doton: Pebble Shot
description: Launches small rocks at high velocity towards the target, dealing minor damage but potentially disrupting their focus.

name: Doton: Rock Clone Jutsu
description: Creates a solid clone made of rock that can physically interact with the environment and absorb damage before dispersing.

name: Earth Wall Jutsu
description: Creates a defensive wall of earth

name: Fūton: Breeze Flick
description: Creates a small gust of wind that can deflect light projectiles or create a momentary distraction.

name: Fūton: Cutter Palm
description: Channels wind chakra into the user's palm, creating a sharp cutting edge that can slice through light materials.

name: Fūton: Gale Shuriken
description: Enhances thrown shuriken with wind chakra, increasing their speed and cutting power.

name: Fūton: Pressure Dome
description: Creates a dome of compressed air around the user, deflecting incoming attacks and creating a barrier against projectiles.

name: Fūton: Vortex Fist
description: Channels wind chakra into a powerful punch, creating a spiraling vortex of air that can knock back and damage opponents.

name: Fūton: Wind Whisper
description: Manipulates air currents to carry sound, allowing for quiet communication over short distances.

name: Henge no Jutsu (Transformation Jutsu)
description: Allows the user to transform their appearance into that of another person or object. The transformation is purely visual and does not grant any abilities of the transformed form.

name: Hiraishin no Jutsu (Flying Thunder God Technique)
Kage Bunshin no Jutsu (Shadow Clone Technique)
Kakuremino no Jutsu (Cloak of Invisibility)
description: Creates a simple illusion that makes the user appear invisible. The technique is easily broken by physical contact or chakra detection.

name: Katon: Blister Dash
description: Channels fire chakra into the user's legs, allowing for a burst of speed and leaving a trail of heat in their wake.

name: Katon: Gōka Messhitsu
description: The user expels a massive wall of intense flames that covers a wide area.

name: Katon: Gōryūka no Jutsu
description: The user compresses chakra into a dragon-headed fireball that incinerates the target.

name: Katon: Heat Mirage
description: Creates a heat distortion that makes the user's movements appear blurred and creates multiple afterimages, making them harder to hit.

name: Katon: Hōsenka Tsumabeni
description: The user unleashes a volley of small fireballs, often concealing shuriken.

name: Medical Ninjutsu: Minor Healing Touch
description: Channels healing chakra through the user's hands to mend minor wounds and restore a small amount of vitality.

name: Persuasion Jutsu
description: Attempts to persuade enemies to surrender

name: Raiton: Charge Step
description: Infuses the user's movement with lightning chakra, providing a sudden burst of speed and leaving a trail of static electricity.

name: Raiton: Pulse Wire
description: Creates a thin wire of lightning chakra that can be used to trip or bind opponents, delivering a shock on contact.

name: Raiton: Thunder Line
description: Creates a line of lightning that travels along the ground, delivering a powerful shock to anyone in its path.

name: Shuriken Kage Bunshin no Jutsu (Shuriken Shadow Clone)
Stone Pillars Jutsu
description: Summons stone pillars from the ground

name: Suiton: Water Bullet Jutsu
description: Compresses water into high-velocity projectiles that can pierce through light armor and cause significant impact damage.

name: Suiton: Water Clone Jutsu
description: Creates a clone made of water that can physically interact with the environment and absorb damage before dispersing.

name: Tajū Kage Bunshin no Jutsu (Multi Shadow Clone Jutsu)
Water Shark Jutsu
description: Creates a shark made of water
